cause.description:
G.M.O. is Geneticaly modified Organisms. If you don't know what that means, it means they take a plant or animal and genetically re-construct it. They do this with our food. We dont eat all natural meat and plants. It has been modified to make the animal what the breeder and farmer wants. They dont care about what happens to the person that scarfs it down. as long as they get a profit. to find out more go to saynotogmos.org
1. GMO Genes can end up in unexpected places: When we dive into the unknown, we dont know what the outcome will be
2. GMO products are already sold in stores, but their not labelled.
3. It is cruelty towards animals. Pigs are now glow in the dark inside and out due to GMO research
cause.name: G.M.O. is Wrong
